Articles.Content:
im not sure where to post this so here it is going but my daughter got a tablet for xmas and she loves to watch these surprise eggs

what i have discovered is there are a number of you tube users using ksp music during there videos

so who do i report it to ive reported to you tube and ive noticed that in 6 days no action as been taken

so is ksps music copyrighted ... its the in space serene music

It's all royalty free music from Kevin MacLeod.

He also has the KSP playlist for easy reference: http://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/most/kerbalspaceprogram.php

Edited January 1, 2018 by Harry Rhodan

Get ready to hear the KSP music everywhere now that you know it.

As @Harry Rhodan points out, it's royalty free music; so anyone can use it!

I won't even tell you some of the places I've heard it...
Ironically I was laughing at a Flat Earth video the other day that was using the same music. I don't think the poor lamb was aware of this.
I hear KSP music everywhere on Youtube and it always throws me off.

6 hours ago, tillyd said:

im not sure where to post this so here it is going but my daughter got a tablet for xmas and she loves to watch these surprise eggs

what i have discovered is there are a number of you tube users using ksp music during there videos

so who do i report it to ive reported to you tube and ive noticed that in 6 days no action as been taken

so is ksps music copyrighted ... its the in space serene music

 

Thank you for the thought, but yes, except for the KSP main theme (which HarvesteR wrote), Squad does not own the music in the game, and so has no copyright to enforce.
